example.name: autogen1
example.text: Wall Street 's nickname for the monthly simultaneous expiration of a variety of stock index futures , index options and options on individual stocks
example.arg: for the monthly simultaneous expiration of a variety of stock index futures , index options and options on individual stocks

example.name: autogen2
example.text: A nickname for measures to stop the market from plunging too far too fast .
example.arg: for measures to stop the market from plunging too far too fast
